ValidationRule.description: For SFS-134 Updated as part of SFS-1396
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(((ISPICKVAL(TerritoryType,"Primary")) || ISPICKVAL(TerritoryType,"Relocation")), OR(ISBLANK(Country), ISBLANK(PostalCode)), NOT(ISPICKVAL( ServiceResource.ResourceType , 'Crew')) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Country and Zip/Postal-Code cannot be blanked for Primary or Relocation type territory
